content: Will new status quo stories continue to be accepted? I'd like to add a story or 2 for Nicklaus, but I need to complete a couple of projects before I will have anything useful to share. Is April 30th the deadline?
I expect to be creating new status quo stories right up until the end
hmm. shoudn’t the shiny future deadline be staggered to fall after the status quo deadline? (To give people a chance to respond to last minute status quo’s?)
but I think it'll work out fine, we'll figure it out when we get closer
